Text: A century ago, the Spanish flu paralysed global affairs, like #COVID19 today. One area of note was how it fractured Christianity across Africa.Here's my story on how it birthed schisms in Nigeria in particular, including the now popular Aladura churches. https://t.co/U2gjkaYsNL

#COVID19 network traffic surge is not impacting the environment.The #mobile sector will form the backbone to the future global economy and will play a unique role in reaching a #netzero carbon economy 🌿➡️ https://t.co/beK3qXUQs6 #EUGreenDeal https://t.co/tYzLfk4TYx

As #COVID19 spread, we continually heard "we're all in this together" as an expression of solidarity. This rings hollow when a fraction of our society faces state-sanctioned violence. We must fix this. #BlackLivesMatter
As an NHS consultant, I have no confidence in the way this Government is handling the #COVID19 pandemic. I also have no confidence that #SAGE members are effectively speaking truth to power. #Level1

Yes. I'm a black woman who loves President Trump. You read it right........I left the Democratic Party and WOKE 👏🏾UP👏🏾after watching OUT OF SHADOWS! Going against the grain, but I don't care. I'm AWAKE! #WWG1WGA

Trump's posing with a bible after directly ordering an attack on a constitutionally legal, peaceful assembly of American citizens is a perversion of decency and the basic tenants of American liberty unequaled in our long history. His words are those of a tyrant. NOT IN THIS LAND

Trump would rather start a civil war than say that black people deserve to be alive. Johnson would rather look after his mate than protect you from a pandemic. Stop voting for people that do not care about you.

Trump just had peaceful demonstrators viciously attacked.  No, Mr. President. This is not a dictatorship. This is the United States of America. Our citizens have a constitutional right to peacefully protest. It's called the First Amendment.
